Online Guide to Writing and Research

Welcome

The Online Guide has many useful features. You can

  • easily search out a needed concept or task by using the Site Search Tool or the Table of Contents

  • walk through the steps of researching and writing various kinds of course assignments

  • follow related ideas within the text by clicking on internal hyperlinks

  • choose from a variety of assessment checklists

  • enrich your understanding of research and writing concepts and enhance your skills by visiting linked websites

  • meet two student writers who discuss their different “takes” on research and writing tasks

Student Services: 1616 McCormick Drive, Largo, MD 20774
Mailing Address: 3501 University Blvd. East, Adelphi, MD 20783
